description: Erection of both side hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 3nos. front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated that the proposal would comply with Condition B.2 (similar materials to existing) of Class B, Part1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The scaling off the submitted drawings and the calculation of the volume of the proposal for a detached dwelling exceeds the permitted development parameters of 50 cubic metres and is therefore in conflict with Class B.1  (d)  (ii) of  Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the proposal would comply with Condition B.2 ( c)  any window inserted on a  wall or roof slope forming a side elevation of the dwellinghouse shall be -   (i) obscure - glazed, and (ii) non- opening unless the parts of the windows which can be opened more than 1.7 metres above the floor of the room in which the window is installed of Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
